name: Planet Invaders 2D
description:
This game is a projet for our Unity class.

The objective is to reach the maximum number of points possible, as in the old retro games like pac-man, tetris etc.

CONTROLS:

Movement: W, A, S, D

Shoot: Left Click or Ctrl

CREDITS:

Martin Casas

Elisa Rojas

Alex Dragomir

Adrian Tomas

Music by: Krakelak
